message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 6
Web Ontology Language
Introduction to OWL
OWL is based in Description Logics
We can represent a knowledge domain computationally in an 
OWL ontology, in order to:
Apply automated reasoning: infer “new” knowledge, queries, consistency, 
classify entities against the ontology, …
Integrate knowledge from different resources
speaker: SYSTEM
